question: Who of the follwing has been appointed as the Performance Director for women's boxing recently?
explanation: Italian coach Raffaele Bergamasco, has been elevated to the position of Performance Director for India's senior women pugilists. Raffaele Bergamasco has been appointed as Performance Director for women's boxing. He will now also be a part of the team coaching the elite women along with coaching the Youth Womens team. He was the man behind India's best ever medal haul at the recently-concluded AIBA Womens Youth Boxing Championship.
